media_data.title: Road House
media_data.short_description: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.
quotes: What if somone calls my momma a whore? Well is she?
Can you afford $100 a month? If it keeps you in the good graces of the church. Funny how money tends to do that
Does a hobby horse have a wooden dick?
Ah shit hell I'm in hog heaven
The ones wh o go looking for trouble aren't much of a problem for the ones who are ready for it
I used to fuck guys like you in prison
media_data.notes: A truly timeless masterpiece. Incredibly quotable, with fun characters that keep your eyes glues to the screen. It's a movie that makes me wish there was a seedy bar from the 80's to go try my luck in. Great takeaways from Daltons character abound. It is refreshing to see characters that are capable from the start, there is no need to try a tune Dalton down. He is the best there is.
